item.title: Reply to switchfollows's tweet at https://twitter.com/switchfollows/statuses/352434924860620800/:

item.description:
Reply to switchfollows's tweet at https://twitter.com/switchfollows/statuses/352434924860620800/:

@switchfollows accidentally click [Skip Attack] instead of [Attack All] -> Restart Duel #Magic2014 #Duels2014
